document_data.name: Spelt
document_data.mainbody: '''Spelt''' was a grain-producing grass found in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Availability: Spelt was cultivated for its grain in ancient [[Netheril]] alongside [[wheat]], [[bran]], [[timothy (plant)|timothy]], [[oat]]s, and [[rye]].
document_data.Ecology: Spelt was affected by the [[wheat rust]] blight, which destroyed the plants and their grains during the time of Netheril. The spreading disease was cured in {{yearlinkConvert|3165|NY}} by the [[arcanist]] [[Candlemas]], who used a complex combination of magics to propagate a cure and save the crops.
